arts.sum: Paolo Zanetti's tenure as Hellas Verona's manager appears to be nearing its end following another crushing defeat, this time at the hands of Empoli. The post Verona’s Zanetti faces Imminent sacking appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Verona confirm Zanetti could be sacked over 24-48 hours
arts.sum: Verona director Sean Sogliano confirms the club is ‘taking 24-48 hours’ to consider sacking coach...

arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona 1-4 Empoli: Match Report
arts.sum: Empoli delivered a crushing blow to Hellas Verona's Serie A survival hopes, securing a dominant 4-1 victory at the Bentegodi Stadium. Sebastiano Esposito was the standout performer, netting a spectacular brace that highlighted Empoli's commanding display. The post Serie A | Verona 1-4 Empoli: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona 1-4 Empoli: Esposito sinks sorry Hellas
arts.sum: Empoli plunged Verona further into crisis with a dominant 4-1 performance at the Bentegodi, including...

arts.ttl: Hellas Verona vs Empoli to start again
arts.sum: Empoli are one of two teams yet to find the back of the net in the last 15 minutes of play this season in the big five European leagues (also Freiburg); in the same period Hellas Verona have scored five goals, more than any other team currently in the bottom five positions of the Serie A table. Empoli have won only one of their seven away Serie A games against Hellas Verona (D1 L5), winning 1-0 in December 2015, thanks to an Andrea Costa goal.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona v Empoli: Match Prediction, Preview, Team News and Lineups
arts.sum: A crucial battle in the fight for Serie A survival is set to unfold at Stadio Bentegodi on Sunday as Hellas Verona host Empoli. The post Serie A | Verona v Empoli: Match Prediction, Preview, Team News and Lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.
